column5: Who is it for?You want to develop a successful career in insurance or risk management; or you already work in one of these fields and want to expand your knowledge and enhance your career potential.At Bayes, you will study both applied and theoretical aspects of insurance and risk management to an advanced level.ObjectivesOur MSc Insurance and Risk Management master's programme will equip you with the all-round knowledge and skills necessary to succeed in the constantly evolving fields of insurance, risk and risk management.
